flawed_nl_solution:
The original flock gains 30-20=<<30-20=20>>20 ducks per year
So after 5 years they have gained 20*5=<<20*5=100>>100 ducks
So the original flock has 100+100=<<100+100=200>>200 ducks
So the combined flock has 200+150=<<200+150=350>>350 ducks

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 20. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
